type.description: Nature of the error. You will get "Resource Conflict", "Invalid Data" and similar messages. This is a simple message of technical nature.

description.description: Error description. This field is localized and can be used to show the error to the final user.

date.description: Date and time when the error occured

key.description: Error key. This is a key that you can use to check for the error and take actions in your application.
